column4: A fearless warrior proficient in melee combat. He is very sturdy\
column5: but takes recoil damage when using his special skill.

column4: A brilliant magician well-versed in area attacks. Both of her skills take effect in multiple directions.
A stealthy archer trained in range combat. His special skill brings more than one of his arrows farther than ever.
A skillful cleric expert in healing. He is a little feeble though\
column5: and his base skill cannot restore his health.
